titles: The history of the English and Scotch presbytery wherein is discovered their designs and practices for the subversion of government in church and state / written in French, by an eminent divine of the Reformed church, and now Englished.
Historie des nouveaux presbytériens anglois et escossois. English
author: Basier, Isaac, 1607-1676.
Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.
Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.
Playford, Matthew.
notes: Attributed to Isaac Basier.  Cf. DNB and Bibliothèque nat. cat.
Also attributed to Pierre Du Moulin and John Bramhall. Cf. Halkett & Laing; Wing also attributes to Du Moulin.
Translated by Matthew Playford.  Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Church and state --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Church and state --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
